name: Mortriz
description:
Mortriz is a tower defense game with a twist. You have to move close to your tower to build it or upgrade it. You also have to collect souls in order to be able to build and upgrade your towers.

Collect souls to build your defenses in this dynamic game where every second is necessary to survive!

Controls:
  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Change Tower: Left and Right click
  • Place tower, upgrade tower: Space bar

Made by: Kíssila Calidoni and Gabriel Faria.
